item.title: Clair Obscur sweeps The Game Awards with nine wins
item.description: The French-made role-playing game is named game of the year and also picks up prizes for music and performance.

item.title: Prada to launch $930 'Made in India' Kolhapuri sandals after backlash
item.description: The deal comes months after Prada faced backlash for allegedly appropriating a sandal design made by Indian artisans.

item.title: 'It was little kids': Taylor Swift breaks down as she talks of Southport attack
item.description: The singer met met families and victims of the Southport stabbing attack, backstage during her Eras tour last year.

item.title: About 200 West African soldiers in Benin for 'clean-up' after failed coup
item.description: This is the first time that officials have said how many foreign soldiers were deployed to help thwart the mutiny.

item.title: Trump signs order to block states from enforcing own AI rules
item.description: California's governor Gavin Newsom issued a strongly-worded statement in response to the executive order.
